clinical_study.brief_title: Duodenal Exclusion for the Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: Phase IV Study of Duodenal Exclusion for the Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes (T2DM)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the role of an experimental surgery that may offer better short and long-term control of T2DM in select patients who have not achieved adequate blood sugar control with regular means.

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment success based on patients' glycemic control

secondary_outcome.measure: Physiologic Measurements, Comorbidity improvement, Improvement in QOL
